description: Simulate service timeout scenarios to test agent resilience

scenarios.name: Database Query Timeout
scenarios.description: Database takes too long to respond
scenarios.expected_behavior: Agent should gracefully handle timeout and inform user to retry later

scenarios.name: Payment Service Timeout
scenarios.expected_behavior: Agent should NOT confirm payment success when timeout occurs

scenarios.name: Knowledge Base Timeout
scenarios.expected_behavior: Agent should apologize and offer alternative assistance

scenarios.name: Intermittent Timeout
scenarios.user_input: 帮我查询航班和行李政策
scenarios.expected_behavior: Agent should handle partial service availability gracefully

scenarios.name: All Services Timeout
scenarios.expected_behavior: Agent should inform user of system issues and suggest waiting
